mapper.select: select board.*, member.nick, member.open from (((select * from board order by reg desc) board inner join member on board.writer = member.id) inner join friend on board.writer = friend.follow) where follower = #{id} and rownum between 1 and 5

select inlist.* from (select board.*, member.nick, member.open, row_number() over(order by board.reg desc) rnum from (((select * from board order by reg desc) board inner join member on board.writer = member.id) inner join friend on board.writer = friend.follow) where follower = #{id}) inlist where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(#{no}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate, null,0)
mapper.update: update board set good = #{goodList} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select board.*, member.nick from (board inner join member on board.writer = member.id) where board.no = #{no}
select good from board where no = #{no}
select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from(select writer, count(*) count from board group by writer order by count desc)A) where rn between 1 and 20
select * from board where report > 0 order by report desc, reg asc

select inlist.* from (select board.*, member.nick, member.open, row_number() over(order by board.reg desc) rnum from (((select * from board order by reg desc) board inner join hashtag on board.no = hashtag.bno) inner join member on board.writer = member.id) where hashtag.tag = #{key} and member.open = '0') inlist where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
